title: Cant connect to game
body:
Everytime i want to join a game, it fails to disconnect. Most of the time I can reconnect in time. But as of late, i cant join at all anymore. I get an error message saying failed to connect to server, retrying doesnt connect me. Neither does restarting client or restarting pc... 
Was wonderering if other people are experiencing the same thing and if there is a fix for this. 

Help!

replies.body: When champion select ends, your network has to transition over to the game server.  It sounds like there's a problem with your network that's failing to connect to the game server and causing that error.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
